short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help you find your games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for the GameVerse website (https://game-verse.jerome-baille.fr/) that lets users automatically retrieve the list of games they own across different platforms.

A GameVerse account is required !
